name: TX TEMP CONT1 600-032
description: The temperature sensor with external PT1000 contact probe allows to measure temperature at the contact of surfaces. The PT1000 probe for temperature measurement can withstand extreme temperatures ranging from -180°C to +250°C, making this LoRa sensor suitable for various applications, such as: cold room temperature monitoring, operating equipment temperature monitoring, temperature monitoring of sensitive points (e.g., data centers), temperature measurement on each sanitary water circuit (see dual PT1000 probe sensor)..etc
author: Akenza AG
